description: A sentence is a list of words that are separated by a single space with no leading or trailing spaces. Words consist of only uppercase and lowercase English letters. Uppercase and lowercase English letters are considered different. A sentence is circular if: For example, "leetcode exercises sound delightful", "eetcode", "leetcode eats soul" are all circular sentences. However, "Leetcode is cool", "happy Leetcode", "Leetcode" and "I like Leetcode" are not circular sentences. Given a string sentence, return true if it is circular. Otherwise, return false.
